Returns the parameters the distribution was constructed with.

@1@ Returns the {{math|a}} distribution parameter (location). The default value is {{c|1.0}}.

@2@ Returns the {{math|b}} distribution parameter (scale). The default value is {{c|0.0}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ The {{math|a}} distribution parameter (location).

@2@ The {{math|b}} distribution parameter (scale).
